summary: The Prompt and Fair Pay Act (H.R. 4559) aims to reform Medicare Advantage (MA) payment practices. It mandates payment parity between MA and fee-for-service Medicare, effective January 1, 2027. Crucially, the bill establishes prompt payment requirements for MA plans, including deadlines for processing claims and penalties, such as interest payments, for late payments. It defines “clean claims,” outlines procedures for handling claim deficiencies, and protects claimant rights.
